short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Everything is just a 'little thing' in the entitled universe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple new-tab background app. It connects daily NASA photo/video to your Chrome. If you love to read universe information everyday, you will easily enjoy it by adding a new tab.

More detail:
The application "Daily Happy Universe" serves as a dynamic wallpaper feature for your new tab page, primarily aimed at enthusiasts of the universe or NASA. It allows users to transform NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day into their personal chrome wallpaper, enriching their daily browsing experience with the beauty and wonder of the cosmos. This feature not only brings the vastness of space closer to space aficionados but also offers a daily dose of inspiration and awe with each new tab opened, by showcasing the stunning imagery captured by NASA.

New updated:
- A better UX by the default content with a star sky for waiting the loading NASA image
- Progressive loading image display
- Image layout and effects
- Offline picture display
- Some bugs fixed
- Privacy policy updated, this app will not collect any of your information
